entry.title: $2000 // Great Area of Bed-Stuy Sunny 1bd Apt Near Nostrand Ave No Fee
entry.content:
Bed-Stuy Nostrand Ave



Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Nostrand Av, Franklin Av. Bright sunny corner 1 bedroom apartment on a historic block in Bed Stuy. Just steps to the Nostrand Ave. (A,C) and the Franklin Ave. (A,C,S) trains, and shops, restaurants, cafes etc. This is a spacious 1bd with an on-site super in a great part of Bed Stuy!

Hardwood Floors
Eat In Kitchen



Text Andrew (5 1 2) seven 8 four - 5 three 5 eight

Plus I have other units in the area so be sure to ask about them!
